thread.title: BRIEF-China Railway Signal & Communication Corp Posts ‍FY Total Aggregate External Contracts Signed By Group Rmb60.73 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Railway Signal & Communication Corp Posts ‍FY Total Aggregate External Contracts Signed By Group Rmb60.73 Bln

organizations.name: reuters) - china railway signal & communication corp ltd

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - China Railway Signal & Communication Corp Ltd:
* ‍FY TOTAL AGGREGATE AMOUNT OF EXTERNAL CONTRACTS SIGNED BY GROUP RMB60.73 BILLION, UP 22.7%​
* ‍EXTERNAL CONTRACTS SIGNED BY GROUP FOR YEAR RMB60.73 BILLION , UP 22.7 PERCENT ​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
